description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9ncq6","text":"The presented protocol describes the analysis of fragments of the SARS-CoV-2 S-gene by the Sanger sequencing. Although whole-genome sequencing is the best method for identifying variants, this tool is not available for all laboratories. In addition Sanger sequencing retains its relevance in the face of increasing morbidity, a large number of samples, or a lack of reagents.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6no32","text":"For analysis, we selected sequence fragments where mutations of various VOC and VOI variants are most common. Depending on the task, different pairs of primers can be used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"41f4v","text":"It is preferable to use samples (nasopharengial swabs) with a Ct less than 25.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

0.2mL","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aaekj","text":"Filter pipette tips: 1-10µL+ 10-100µL","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7s0aj","text":"Micropipettes: 1-10µL+ 10-100µL","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qrqf","text":"Riboprep (NA extraction kit, Amplisense, Moscow, Russia)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4delb","text":"Reverta L (cDNA synthesis kit, Amplisense, Moscow, Russia)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a3elg","text":"Primers","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bjuc3","text":"Nuclease values","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9t454","text":"Agarose","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"abqr6","text":"TAE buffer (Tris-acetate-EDTA)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"nl5e","text":"Loading status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5bsd","text":"This section is carried out in accordance with the manufacturer's instructions for the Riboprep Nucleic Acid Isolation Kit, Amplisens, Moscow, Russia.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bh3ce","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5108u","text":"1. Introduce 300 µl of lysis solution into the pure tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ua42","text":"2. Add 100 µl each of samples and positive controls.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ek2vu","text":"3. Mix gently and place in thermostat for   at 65℃.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3b75","text":"4. Add 400 µl of precipitation solution. Mix, centrifuge for   at 13,000 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cfcac","text":"5. Remove the supernatant without touching the sediment. Add 500 µl of wash solution 3, wash the precipitate by inverting the tube 3-5 times. Centrifuge 1 min at 13,000 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"671s4","text":"6. Remove the supernatant without touching the sediment. Dry the precipitate in a thermostat with an open lid for 5 min at 65℃.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bb3it","text":"7. Add 50 µl of RNA buffer. Stir, in a thermostat for 5 min at 65℃. Then mix again.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1t8hp","text":"8. Centrifuge 1 min at 13,000 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajj8g","text":"The supernatant contains purified RNA and DNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eqk72","text":"Shelf life of purified RNA/DNA at 2-8℃ - 24 hours, at -16℃ - one year.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"5EAF3116E35611EDA9510A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"69B2A2A1E35611EDA9510A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"154rn","text":"Agarose gel was prepared in 1.5 g/ml and stained with ethidium bromide.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8q1k4","text":"PCR products were purified from agarose gel according to Cleanup Mini kit instructions, Evrogene, Catalog # BC023S.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6bc6t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7q1f6","text":"1. Cut out and weigh the gel fragment containing the DNA. Put it in test tube 2 ml.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f13r1","text":"2. Add 3 volumes of \"Binding Solution\" to the tube with gel, but at least 350 µl.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ceu7g","text":"3. Incubate mixture at 50-55°C until complete dissolution gel. To speed up the dissolution, it is recommended to stir the solution shaking the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3bjt8","text":"4. Place the spin column in a collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"caol","text":"5. Transfer the sample prepared according to paragraphs 2.1-2.3 to the column andcentrifuge 30 seconds. Remove the filtrate from the collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"df60n","text":"6. Add 700 µl of Wash Solution to the column, centrifuge for 30 seconds. Remove the filtrate from the collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9lf0s","text":"7. Centrifuge the empty column for 1 minute to completely remove the Wash Solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"folqh","text":"8. Transfer the column to a new 1.5- or 2.0-ml tube. Apply to the center of the column 15 µl of \"Eluent Solution\".","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8o9dh","text":"9. Centrifuge 1 minute to collect purified DNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9a6d8","text":"Measure DNA Concentration with a Nanodrop spectrophotometer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9uir","text":"Dilute template to 200 ng/µl with nuclease-free water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e26e2","text":"Dilute primers to 1 µM with nuclease-free water. Only one primer is used for each sequencing reaction, leading to two reactions per sample. Each reaction will need 1µl of diluted primer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3q74","text":"Sequencing reaction is performed with BigDye Terminator v3.1 (Applied Biosystems) and run in capillary electrophoresis (ABI 3500, Applied Biosystems), according to the manufacturer’s instructions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
